_readme.description: Team-shared MCP server configuration. Commit this file to share servers across team.
_readme.architecture: Unified template with tiered MCP servers for different use cases.

tiers.essential: sequential-thinking, context7 - Core reasoning and documentation
tiers.search: exa, jina - Web search and reading
tiers.development: filesystem, github, postgres - Dev tooling (configure in settings.local.json)

api_keys.required: None - all essential servers work without keys

sequential-thinking._usage: Complex problem decomposition, architectural decisions, root cause analysis

context7._usage: Framework docs, API references, code examples

playwright._comment: BROWSER: Automation for testing and UI verification
playwright._usage: E2E tests, screenshots, form filling, browser testing

memory._comment: PERSISTENCE: Knowledge graph for cross-session memory
memory._usage: Entities, relations, facts that persist across sessions

exa._comment: SEARCH: AI-powered semantic web search (freemium - works without key)
exa._usage: Research, finding code examples, technical documentation

jina._comment: SEARCH: Web content reader and SERP results (freemium)
jina._usage: Reading URLs, extracting content, web scraping

_installation.step2: Copy this file to your project root as .mcp.json
_installation.step3: Restart Claude Code to load MCP servers
_installation.step4: Optional: Set API keys in environment for enhanced search

_commands_using_mcp./research: Uses exa, jina, context7 for comprehensive research
